text: This is a list of presidents of Iraq since 1958. ==List== Name Name Portrait Lifespan Elected Took office Left office Time in office Political party → • Iraqi Republic (pre–Ba'ath Party) (1958–1968) • 1 Muhammad Najib ar-Ruba'i محمد نجيب الربيعي 1904–1965 — 14 July 1958 8 February 1963 4 years, 207 days Military 2 Abdul Salam Arif عبد السلام عارف 1921–1966 — 8 February 1963 13 April 1966 3 years, 65 days Military / Arab Socialist Union — Abd ar-Rahman al-Bazzaz عبد الرحمن البزاز 1913–1973 — 13 April 1966 16 April 1966 3 days Arab Socialist Union 3 Abdul Rahman Arif عبد الرحمن عارف 1916–2007 — 16 April 1966 17 July 1968 2 years, 92 days Military / Arab Socialist Union → • Iraqi Republic (under Ba'ath Party) (1968–2003) • 4 Ahmed Hassan al-Bakr أحمد حسن البكر 1914–1982 — 17 July 1968 16 July 1979 10 years, 364 days Military / Iraqi Ba'ath 5 Saddam Hussein صدام حسين 1937–2006 1995 2002 16 July 1979 9 April 2003 23 years, 267 days Iraqi Ba'ath • Iraqi Governing Council (2003–2004) • — Coalition Provisional Authority — — 21 April 2003 28 June 2004 434 days — → • Republic of Iraq (2004–present) • — Ghazi Mashal Ajil al-Yawer غازي مشعل عجيل الياور 1958– — 28 June 2004 7 April 2005 283 days Independent 6 Jalal Talabani جلال طالباني 1933–2017 — 7 April 2005 24 July 2014 9 years, 108 days Patriotic Union of Kurdistan 7 Fuad Masum فؤاد معصوم 1938– — 24 July 2014 2 October 2018 4 years, 68 days Patriotic Union of Kurdistan 8 Barham Salih بەرهەم ساڵح 1960– — 2 October 2018 13 October 2022 Patriotic Union of Kurdistan 9 Latif Rashid لطيف رشيد لەتیف رەشید 1944– —
